About the Author
Steve Miller is a freelance science writer specializing in physical science and educational writing. He contributes to trade magazines and journals, including Analytical Chemistry, and writes science and math curriculum materials, including science textbooks, for grades K-12. Prior to his career as a writer, he worked as a chemist at manufacturing companies for more than 20 years.
